dao.interfaces

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDAO

    public interface CompanyDAO
    The CompanyDAO interface provides seven basics methods for DML functionality and two additional methods.
    The CompanyDAO interface throws all exceptions to the throwable class CouponSystemException.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDAO
    Version:
    1.00, 28/07/2016
    Author:
    Morris Elkanaev
